pkgmetadata.longdescription: Paired/Unpaired Parametric/Non-Parametric Group Comparisons // Receives two vectors, computes appropriate function for group comparison (i.e., t-test, Mann-Whitney; equality of variances), and reports the findings (mean/median, standard deviation, test statistic, p-value, effect size) in APA format (Fay, M.P., Proschan, M.A. (2010)DOI: 10.1214/09-SS051).
